TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ludja, title = Ludja, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludja} }

S.FORM: Ludja i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Ludja. u kasalumaluma' nu Ludja sa, 42 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 184 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 175 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 9 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5 . u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93 , Amis 1 , Bunun 1 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
